name: Gourmet Grilled Cheese
author: Stina
summary: Tangy goat cheese, tomatoes, and a crispy coating of grated Romano cheese set these sandwiches above the rest.
directions: Place the beaten eggs in a wide, shallow bowl, and set aside
Place the grated Romano cheese in a wide, shallow dish, and set aside
Spread the goat cheese onto one side of each slice of bread
Sandwich two tomato slices between two pieces of bread, then dip both sides into the beaten egg
Allow the excess to drip off, then press the sandwiches into the grated Romano cheese, coating well on each side; set aside
Heat a large, nonstick skillet over medium heat
Cook the sandwiches until golden brown and crisp, about 3 minutes per side
